data.text: @ukhistorygirl @princesspleats I know that's what's been done in the past with British history. Just a shame she can't abdicate to her grandson and skip a generation. Controversial I know. Can always hope. Nothing against Prince Charles. Just a fan of William.
@Kaytea21 @princesspleats Her Majesty doesn’t pass the crown on to anyone when the time comes. She doesn’t choose her successor, it goes to her oldest son
